title: Naturopathic Therapy Tigard OR - Straight Up Chiropractic
description: Want to learn more about Naturopath? Click here to check out our naturopathic therapies that our clinic offers!
cleaned_text: Naturopath THERAPY in Tigard Are you looking for [naturopath therapy in Tigard](/)? The experienced team at Straight Up Chiropractic is ready to help you! If you have any questions regarding the services listed below, please feel free to reach out! Naturopath Services in Tigard Here is a list of services we offer: Trigger Point Injections: Injections into muscles to relax tension, and reduce pain. Regenerative Injection Therapy: - Prolotherapy: The classic regenerative injection therapy. A 5% dextrose solution that Dr. Smitherman has been injecting into patients joints with good results for years - Platelet Rich Plasma (PRP): A growth factor concentrate made from your own blood that is injected into joints - Amniotic Fluid Injection: An injection solution for joints that has the regenerative growth factors of amniotic fluid Sphenopalatine Ganglion Block: A new, non-invasive, no needles, 5-minute procedure with to a 95% effective rate for migraine treatment Pharmaceutical Management: Prescription pain management Botanical Medicine: Botanical Solutions to reduce inflammation and promote joint health OFFICE HOURS Monday 9:00am - 6:00pm Tuesday 9:00am - 6:00pm Wednesday 9:00am - Thursday - Friday 10:00 am - 4:00pm Saturday 9:00am - 1:00pm Straight Up Chiropractic 12700
